content: i haven`t made any patterns before so i`m sorry if this doesn`t make much sense 1 chain 8 stitches and close the 1 2 3 4 circle 2 single_crochet into all of the 8 stitches 8 sts 3 single_crochet twice into each stitch 16 sts 4 *chain 2 and single_crochet* do ** into all 16 sts creating loops 16 loops 5 *chain 2 and sct into the loops do ** into all the loop 16 loops 6 *chain 4 and single_crochet into the loop* do ** into all the loops 16 loops terms 5 7 *chain 6 and single_crochet into the loop* do 6 7 9 chain chain ** into all the loops 16 loops 8 *chain 8 and single_crochet into the loop* do single_crochet single_crochet ** into all the loops 16 loops stitches - sts 9 keep doing step 8 until you have the desired length of the bag what you`ll need 10 *single_crochet 6 time into 1 loop chain 2* - 4 mm hook if do ** in all the loops you wish you can 11 bind off use a different 12 chain a string and tread in into size the holes created by the 2 chains 10 - double knit yarn all the way around 12 again you can 13 tie the string and weave in loose use another ends thickness if you enjoy your fruit bag want i used about 100g for 3 fruit nets but it depends on how big you want to make the fruit net
